spec_data.Name: jruby
spec_data.License: (CPL or GPLv2+ or LGPLv2+) and BSD and (GPLv2 or Ruby) and (BSD or Ruby)
spec_data.Description:
JRuby is a 100% Java implementation of the Ruby programming language.
It is Ruby for the JVM. JRuby provides a complete set of core "builtin"
classes and syntax for the Ruby language, as well as most of the Ruby
Standard Libraries.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 07:39:07 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Pure Java implementation of the Ruby interpreter
